attributes.action: Give Savile Row, Westminster - World Heritage Site status
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to put forward Savile Row for UNESCO World Heritage Site status to help protect and nurture the craftsmanship, skills and talents of the tailors of Savile Row, to keep their traditions alive. Also to stop the ongoing encroachment of huge corporate fashion houses wishing to bask in the Savile Row glory, this could be executed through an exclusion zone around Savile Row where no companies could operate without the agreement of all parties already within Savile Row.
